id.description: The global ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

assignee_id.description: Return issues assigned to the given user id. Mutually exclusive with assignee_username. None returns unassigned issues; Any returns issues with an assignee.

assignee_username.description: Return issues assigned to the given username. Mutually exclusive with assignee_id.

author_id.description: Return issues created by the given user id. Mutually exclusive with author_username.

author_username.description: Return issues created by the given username. Mutually exclusive with author_id.

created_after.description: Return issues created on or after the given ISO 8601 time.

created_before.description: Return issues created on or before the given ISO 8601 time.

due_date.description: Filter by due date state: 0 (no due date), any, today, tomorrow, overdue, week, month, next_month_and_previous_two_weeks.

epic_id.description: Return issues associated with the given epic ID. None returns issues not associated with an epic; Any returns issues associated with an epic. Premium and Ultimate only.

iids[].description: Return only the issues having the given iid.

issue_type.description: Filter to a given type of issue. One of issue, incident, test_case, task.

iteration_id.description: Return issues assigned to the given iteration ID. None returns issues with no iteration; Any returns issues with an iteration. Mutually exclusive with iteration_title. Premium and Ultimate only.

iteration_title.description: Return issues assigned to the iteration with the given title. Mutually exclusive with iteration_id. Premium and Ultimate only.

labels.description: Comma-separated list of label names; issues must have all labels. None lists all issues with no labels; Any lists all issues with at least one label. Predefined names are case-insensitive.

milestone.description: Filter by milestone title. None lists all issues with no milestone; Any lists all issues that have an assigned milestone.

my_reaction_emoji.description: Return issues reacted to by the authenticated user with the given emoji. None returns issues not given a reaction; Any returns issues with at least one reaction.

not.description: Return issues that do not match the supplied parameters. Accepts: labels, milestone, author_id, author_username, assignee_id, assignee_username, my_reaction_emoji, search, in.

order_by.description: Order by one of created_at, updated_at, priority, due_date, relative_position, label_priority, milestone_due, popularity, weight. Default created_at.

scope.description: Return issues for the given scope: created_by_me, assigned_to_me, or all. Default all.

search.description: Search project issues against title and description.

sort.description: Sort order: asc or desc. Default desc.

state.description: Return all, opened, or closed issues.

updated_after.description: Return issues updated on or after the given ISO 8601 time.

updated_before.description: Return issues updated on or before the given ISO 8601 time.

weight.description: Return issues with the specified weight. None returns issues with no weight; Any returns issues with a weight. Premium and Ultimate only.

with_labels_details.description: If true, returns more details for each label: name, color, description, description_html, text_color. Default false.

id.description: The global ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

issue_iid.description: The internal ID of a project’s issue.

id.description: The global ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

assignee_id.description: ID of the user to assign the issue to. Only appears on GitLab Free.

assignee_ids.description: IDs of users to assign the issue to. Premium and Ultimate only.

confidential.description: Set the issue to be confidential. Default false.

created_at.description: When the issue was created. ISO 8601, requires administrator or project/group owner rights.

description.description: Description of the issue. Up to 1,048,576 characters.

discussion_to_resolve.description: ID of a discussion to resolve by creating the issue. Use with merge_request_to_resolve_discussions_of.

epic_id.description: ID of the epic to add the issue to. Premium and Ultimate only.

epic_iid.description: IID of the epic to add the issue to. Deprecated; scheduled for removal in API v5. Premium and Ultimate only.

iid.description: Internal ID of the project’s issue (requires administrator or project owner rights).

issue_type.description: Type of issue. One of issue, incident, test_case, task. Default issue.

labels.description: Comma-separated label names to assign. Creates project labels if they do not exist.

merge_request_to_resolve_discussions_of.description: IID of a merge request in which to resolve all discussions.

milestone_id.description: Global ID of a milestone to assign.

weight.description: Weight of the issue. Premium and Ultimate only.

id.description: The global ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

issue_iid.description: The internal ID of a project’s issue.

assignee_ids.description: IDs of users to assign. Set to 0 or empty to unassign all.

description.description: Description of the issue. Up to 1,048,576 characters.

discussion_locked.description: If true, only project members can add or edit comments.

epic_id.description: ID of the epic to add the issue to. Premium and Ultimate only.

epic_iid.description: IID of the epic to add the issue to. Deprecated; scheduled for removal in API v5. Premium and Ultimate only.

issue_type.description: Update type of issue. One of issue, incident, test_case, task.

labels.description: Comma-separated label names. Set to empty string to unassign all labels. Creates labels if they do not exist.

milestone_id.description: Global ID of a milestone to assign. Set to 0 or empty to unassign.

updated_at.description: When the issue was updated (ISO 8601). Requires administrator or project owner rights. Empty/null not accepted.

weight.description: Weight of the issue. Premium and Ultimate only.

id.description: The global ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

issue_iid.description: The internal ID of a project’s issue.

action: Add a new emoji reaction to an issue

id.description: The global ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

issue_iid.description: The internal ID of a project’s issue (use when awarding an emoji on an issue).

name.description: Name of the emoji without colons.
